channel.title: Cuber-Rune ~ 317 PI ~
channel.description:
"Banner" Coming soon, till that; [img]http://www.rune-server.org/static/avatar/avatar152747_1.gif[/img]
[u][b]I'm 15 years old boy from Finland, I am beginner on coding but i believe i will learn a lot from the great community of MoparScape.
Enough information about me, now for the server, I am currently coding a version 317 PI, Cuber-Rune.
I am going to update this topic about 2 times a week and add new pictures and information. [/b][/u]
[size=14pt][font=comic sans ms]What has been added;[/font][/size]
• [size=10pt][font=andale mono][b]Level points & Level point shop.[/b] [/font][/size]• [size=10pt][font=andale mono][b]Dicing.[/b] [/font][/size]• [size=10pt][font=andale mono][b]Achievements. [color=black](Killstreak, Monsters killed, ETC.)[/color][/b] [/font][/size]
[font=comic sans ms][size=14pt]What i am going to add;[/size][/font]
• [font=andale mono][size=10pt][b]Flower gaming.[/b] [/size][/font]• [font=andale mono][size=10pt][b]Donators shop with donator points.[/b] [/size][/font]• [font=courier][size=10pt][b]Vote4Cash.[/b] [/size][/font]• [font=courier][size=10pt][b]Exp lamps. [color=black](Tradeable, Rare drop from hard monsters)[/color][/b] [/size][/font]
[font=comic sans ms][size=14pt]What i will add if i got time;[/size][/font]
• [font=andale mono][size=10pt][b]Clues.[/b][/size][/font] • [font=andale mono][size=10pt][b]Staff Zone.[/b][/size][/font] • [font=andale mono][size=10pt][b]Highscores.[/b][/size][/font] • [font=andale mono][size=10pt][b]Bank Tabs.[/b][/size][/font] • [font=andale mono][size=10pt][b]Quests.[/b][/size][/font]
Note : This is like the ''base'' for my development topic, I will add things here 1 by 1.

[u][b]I’m 15 years old boy from Finland, I am beginner on coding but i believe i will learn a lot from the great community of MoparScape.
